description: DigitalBits core node health information and detailed metrics

panels.description:
Number of digitalbits-core nodes that prometheus knows about.

This panel looks at targets defined in a prometheus job with name matching ".*digitalbits.core.*" regex.
panels.title: Node count

valueMaps.text: Can't find targets in the ".*digitalbits.core.*" job

panels.description:
Percentage of digitalbits-core nodes that are up

This panel looks at targets defined in a prometheus job with name matching ".*digitalbits.core.*" regex.
panels.title: Reachable nodes %

valueMaps.text: Can't find targets in the ".*digitalbits.core.*" job

panels.description:
The number of failed nodes that would cause this instance to halt.

The query assumes all machines are members of the same quorum. If they are not they have to be split using the environment label.
panels.title: Quorum fail at

valueMaps.text: Can't find targets in the ".*digitalbits.core.*" job

panels.description: Number of nodes without quorum intersection
panels.title: Nodes without quorum intersection

panels.description: Time since youngest node was started
panels.title: Latest node start

panels.description: Time since oldest node was started
panels.title: Oldest node start

panels.description:
Age of the oldest ledger among monitored nodes.
If this value is high it means some nodes are may be behind.
panels.title: Oldest Ledger Age

valueMaps.text: Can't find targets in the ".*digitalbits.core.*" job

panels.description:
Some of the nodes selected support protocol version higher than protocol of the ledger.

This prometheus query may be used to show nodes with possible upgrade:
digitalbits_core_protocol_version > digitalbits_core_ledger_version

Note that if you selected nodes from more than one quorum this panel might show incorrect data.
panels.title: Available Protocol Update

panels.description:
Out of Sync Nodes

Expected value is 0
panels.title: Out of Sync Nodes

panels.description: Number of quorum changes in the last hour on host with the highest number of changes
panels.title: Quorum changes last hour (max)

panels.description:
Number of nodes with quorum transitive critical

Expected value is 0
panels.title: Quorum transitive critcal nodes

panels.description: Percentage of ledgers closed within 7s in selected timerange.

panels.title: SLI in last 7d

panels.description:
Quorum Transitive Critical Peers.
Number in the right column is a count of instances that have the peer in their quorum.
In a healthy environment this panel should show no data
panels.title: Quorum Transitive Critical Peers

panels.description:

panels.description:
Quorum Transitive Critical Peers
No data is good news, it means no critical peers are detected
